title: How come there are no bans in URF?
body: How come there are no bans in URF because every time (most of the time) there are the most OP champions in League like still have it random pick and why can't we have a 6 men ban system like we did for the other game modes because URF is mean't to be fun but instead you are getting CC'ed to the max, a Master Yi killing everyone non stop tanks with passives that health for so much like please Riot can we have a ban system so people can have a good time.

replies.body: They should bring back normal URF like everyone wants and have the 10 ban system implemented. Everyone gets to choose their champ and any "op" champions you don't want to play against you can ban. That way everyone is happy.

There are some champs that are permabanned i believe (sona being the only one i can think of) maybe if riot gets told enough who the OP's are they will be nerfed for urf (like brand permastun was) or perma'd like sona

This is why we don't get bans in URF, also bans take to long, therefore not rapid-fire
10 bans are too many for urf. 6 would do.

I agree, having ban phase then randomly assigning champions might be a good compromise for us the players and rito who insists on giving us ARURF.

counterpoint: that would restrict the game mode to players with 21 unlocked champions (including free week).
